title: Day of Glory

tokens.lyric: Through silent darkness comes, His constant clearest voice.

lines.raw: [E]Through silent darkness comes, His constant clearest voice.

tokens.lyric: His words of truth and life wake us up from sleep.

lines.raw: [F#m]His words of truth and life wake us up from sleep.

tokens.lyric: Glory, O Glory, O Glorious Lord,
Welcome, O Welcome, O Welcome Him now,

lines.raw: [A]Welcome, O Welcome, O Welcome Him now,

tokens.lyric: Giving all you have and join with our Lord,

lines.raw: [C#]Giving all you have and join with our Lord,

tokens.lyric: One with our God, Sharing love and beauty evermore.

lines.raw: [F#m]One with our God, Sharing love and beauty evermore.

tokens.lyric: For now the day all men desire Day of celebration is at hand!

lines.raw: [B7]For now the day all men desire Day of celebration is at hand!

tokens.lyric: Sunrise and morning comes, we rise up in its light,

lines.raw: [C#m]Sunrise and morning comes, we rise up in its light,

tokens.lyric: Spread forth the word of good, giving all your strength.

lines.raw: [F#m]Spread forth the word of good, giving all your strength.

tokens.lyric: All holy children come, new days have dawned at last,

lines.raw: [B]All holy children come, new days have dawned at last,

tokens.lyric: March forward one and all, quickly now unite.

lines.raw: [E]March forward one and all, quickly now unite.
